overview: Marco Rubin is the managing partner of Exoventure Associates, LLC and an advisor to CIT GAP Funds. He has invested in over 25 early-stage technology companies throughout his career and has held leadership roles with funds recognized by Entrepreneur Magazine as Top 100 VCs in 2002, 2003, 2005 and 2006. Prior to forming Exoventure, Rubin was founder of Monumental Venture Partners, LLC (MVP) making investments in security, information technology, telecommunications, software and medical devices sectors. Before MVP, Rubin ran New Ventures, MCIâ€™s venture capital unit until the company’s acquisition in 1998. Rubin holds an MBA from George Washington University and a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from the University of New Mexico.
